Proper wax maintenance is crucial for ensuring the longevity and optimal performance of your hearing aids. By incorporating Prowax MiniFit Filters into your maintenance routine, you can prevent the buildup of ear wax, a common cause of problems in hearing aids, and experience the best sound quality.

With compatibility in mind, it is important to use the same type of wax filter that was originally supplied with your hearing aid. If you require guidance, consult a hearing care professional.

Each pack of 6 Prowax MiniFit filters also includes a convenient tool for easy removal and attachment, as well as a holder case for storing used and new filters.

Don't miss out on the special offer bundle of 3 packets for £20. Upgrade your hearing aid maintenance today with Oticon Prowax MiniFit Filters.

## Key Takeaways

- Regular wax maintenance is crucial for the longevity and optimal performance of hearing aids.
- Wax guards should be changed every 3-4 weeks or when there is a noticeable decrease in sound quality or visible wax buildup.
- The Prowax miniFit filters are compatible with all Oticon miniRITE Hearing aids, including the NEW Oticon More miniRITE hearing aid.
- Special offers and bundle options are available, such as a pack of 6 filters with a tool and holder case, as well as a bundle of 3 packets for £20.

## The Importance of Proper Maintenance

Proper maintenance is crucial for ensuring optimal performance and longevity of your hearing aids.

Regular cleaning of the hearing aid pieces is essential to prevent wax buildup, one of the main causes of problems in hearing aids. By keeping the hearing aids clean and free from wax, you can ensure the best working order and sound quality from the aid/receiver.

It is important to change the wax guards regularly, usually every 3-4 weeks, to maintain optimal performance. If you notice a dip in sound quality or visible buildup on the wax filter, it is time to change the wax guard.

It is recommended to consult a hearing care professional if you are unsure about the replacement of wax filters to ensure proper maintenance and compatibility with your hearing aids.

## Understanding Wax Guard Replacement

To ensure optimal performance and longevity of your hearing aids, it is imperative to have a clear understanding of when and how to replace the wax guard.

Wax guards require changing regularly, typically every 3-4 weeks. It is recommended to change the wax guard when the sound quality starts to decline or when the filter is visibly built up with wax. However, everyone's timing may vary, so it is essential to monitor the sound quality and visual buildup.

Changing the wax guard helps maintain optimal performance and prevents wax from blocking the sound outlet. If unsure about the replacement of wax filters, it is advisable to consult a hearing care professional for guidance.

Proper maintenance of the wax guard ensures the best sound quality and functionality of your hearing aids.

## Compatibility With Oticon Hearing Aids

The Prowax MiniFit filters are compatible with all models of Oticon miniRITE Hearing aids, including the latest Oticon More miniRITE hearing aid. This compatibility ensures that users of Oticon hearing aids can benefit from the advanced wax protection provided by the Prowax MiniFit filters.

Whether you have an older model or the newest Oticon hearing aid, you can trust that the Prowax MiniFit filters will fit and function perfectly. This compatibility is crucial in maintaining the optimal performance and fit of your hearing aids.

It is recommended to always use the same type of wax filter as originally supplied with your hearing aid to ensure the best results. If you have any doubts or questions about compatibility, it is advisable to consult a hearing care professional for guidance.

## Features and Benefits of Prowax MiniFit Filters

The advanced design of the Prowax MiniFit filters enhances the performance and longevity of Oticon miniRITE Hearing aids. These filters offer several features and benefits that make them a valuable addition to your hearing aid maintenance routine:

- Effective Wax Protection: The Prowax MiniFit filters efficiently trap earwax and prevent it from entering the delicate components of your hearing aids. This helps to maintain optimal sound quality and prevents damage caused by wax buildup.

- Easy Replacement: The filters are designed for easy removal and attachment, allowing for quick and hassle-free replacement. This ensures that you can maintain the cleanliness of your hearing aids without any difficulty.

- Long-lasting Performance: With a pack of 6 filters included, the Prowax MiniFit filters provide you with an extended period of effective wax protection. This means that you can enjoy the benefits of clear sound and optimal performance for a longer period of time.

## How to Change the Wax Guard

Changing the wax guard on your Oticon miniRITE Hearing aids is a crucial step in maintaining optimal performance and preventing wax buildup.

To change the wax guard, start by removing the old wax filter using the tool provided in the pack of Oticon Prowax MiniFit filters. Insert the tool into the small hole on the hearing aid and gently twist it counterclockwise to remove the old wax guard.

Next, take a new wax filter from the pack and align the tool with the hole on the filter. Insert the tool and twist it clockwise to securely attach the new wax guard.

It is important to change the wax guard regularly, approximately every 3-4 weeks, or when the sound quality starts to decline or when visible wax buildup occurs.

## Tips for Prolonging the Life of Your Hearing Aid

To maximize the lifespan of your hearing aid, implementing proper care and maintenance practices is essential. Here are some tips to help you prolong the life of your device:

- Clean your hearing aid regularly: Use a soft, dry cloth to remove any debris or moisture from the device. Avoid using water or cleaning solutions, as they can damage the electronic components.

- Store your hearing aid properly: When not in use, keep your device in a dry and safe place. Use a protective case or pouch to prevent dust, moisture, and accidental damage.

- Avoid exposure to extreme temperatures: Heat and humidity can negatively impact the performance of your hearing aid. Keep it away from direct sunlight, heaters, and other sources of excessive heat.

## Expert Advice on Wax Filter Replacement

For optimal performance, it is crucial to regularly replace the wax filters in your Oticon miniRITE hearing aids. Wax filters play a vital role in preventing earwax and debris from entering the delicate components of your hearing aids, ensuring clear and high-quality sound transmission.

It is recommended to change the wax filters every 3-4 weeks or when you notice a decline in sound quality or visible buildup on the filter. However, it's important to note that everyone's timing may vary depending on personal wax buildup and daily usage.

If you're unsure about the replacement process, it is best to consult a hearing care professional who can provide expert advice and guidance.

## Storing and Organizing Your Filters

To effectively maintain your Oticon miniRITE hearing aids and ensure easy access to replacement filters, it is essential to have a proper storage and organization system in place. Here are three key points to consider:

- Use a designated holder case: Invest in a holder case specifically designed for storing your used and new filters. This will keep them protected and easily accessible when needed.

- Label and categorize: Create a labeling system to distinguish between used and new filters. You can use different colored stickers or markers to indicate their status. Additionally, categorize filters based on their type or size to streamline the replacement process.

- Keep extras on hand: Always have a few extra filters readily available. This way, you won't have to worry about running out when you need them the most. Storing them in a separate compartment within the holder case will ensure they are easily identifiable and accessible.

## Take Advantage of Special Offers

By taking advantage of the special offers available, you can enhance your hearing aid maintenance with Oticon Prowax Minifit filters.

The special offer bundle includes 3 packets of Prowax Minifit filters for just £20. This is a great opportunity to stock up on filters and ensure that you have an ample supply for regular maintenance.

Each packet contains 6 filters, providing you with a total of 18 filters in the bundle. Additionally, each filter comes with a tool for easy removal and attachment, making the maintenance process even more convenient.

To further assist with organization, a holder case is provided for storing used and new filters.

Don't miss out on this special offer and revolutionize your hearing aid maintenance today.

## Frequently Asked Questions (Faqs) About Prowax Minifit Filters

One common question about Prowax Minifit filters is how often they should be changed.

Here are some frequently asked questions (FAQs) about Prowax Minifit filters:

- How often should Prowax Minifit filters be changed?
- Prowax Minifit filters should be changed regularly, usually every 3-4 weeks.

- When should I change the wax guard?
- The wax guard should be changed when the sound quality starts to deteriorate or when the wax filter is visibly built up.

- How do I know when it's time to change the wax guard?
- Monitor the sound quality and visual buildup of the wax filter to determine when it needs to be changed.

## Frequently Asked Questions

Cleaning hearing aid pieces regularly is crucial to prevent wax buildup and maintain optimal performance. The frequency of cleaning depends on personal wax buildup and daily usage, but it is generally recommended to clean every 3-4 weeks or when sound quality starts to decline.

Yes, the Prowax MiniFit filters are specifically designed for use with Oticon miniRITE Hearing aids, including the NEW Oticon More miniRITE hearing aid. For compatibility with other brands, it is best to consult a hearing care professional for guidance.

column2: Starkey Custom Charger Case – For Rechargeable Custom Aids
column4:
Discover the future of hearing aid technology with Starkey's groundbreaking Custom Charger Case. Say goodbye to old charging methods and experience true convenience. Click now!

# Starkey Unveils Revolutionary Custom Charger Case

Starkey, a renowned leader in the field of hearing technology, has introduced an innovative product that is set to revolutionize the way we charge and care for our hearing aids.

The Starkey Custom Charger Case is a groundbreaking device designed specifically for selected custom Starkey hearing aids. It utilizes LED light indicators and lithium technology to provide quick and convenient charging.

Not only does the Custom Charger Case ensure easy recharging, but it also doubles as a stylish carry case for your hearing aids. With its sleek metallic black color and smooth surface, this portable charging station exudes style and sophistication.

Additionally, the Custom Charger Case offers exceptional compatibility with Starkey's custom products, making it an indispensable accessory for those seeking a convenient and efficient charging solution.

## Key Takeaways

- The Starkey Custom Charger Case is compatible with selected custom Starkey hearing devices such as Evolv AI, Livio Edge AI, Livio AI, and Livio ITC/HS Rechargeable and ITE Rechargeable hearing aids.
- It utilizes LED light indicators and lithium technology for quick and easy charging, with the ability to provide at least 3 charges for lithium-ion rechargeable hearing aids.
- The charger case is produced by Starkey, a company known for its innovative products and ideas.
- It functions as a portable charging station and carry case, with additional features such as a stylish metallic black color, smooth surface with a magnetic lid, and on-board charger for charging on the go.

## Features of the Starkey Custom Charger Case

The Starkey Custom Charger Case offers a range of innovative features designed to enhance the charging experience for selected custom Starkey hearing devices. This portable charging station and carry case is suitable for custom Starkey hearing devices such as Evolv AI, Livio Edge AI, Livio AI, and Livio ITC/HS Rechargeable and ITE Rechargeable hearing aids.

It utilizes LED light indicators and lithium technology for quick and easy charging. The case includes a cleaning tool brush and wax loop for aid maintenance. It provides at least 3 charges for lithium-ion rechargeable hearing aids before requiring recharging.

The charger case is produced by Starkey, a renowned company known for its innovative products and ideas. With its stylish metallic black color, magnetic lid, and on-board charger for charging on the go, the Starkey Custom Charger Case offers a convenient and efficient charging solution for users of custom Starkey hearing devices.

## Compatibility With Starkey Hearing Aids

The Custom Charger Case from Starkey is compatible with a range of Starkey hearing aids, providing a convenient charging solution for users of these devices. This compatibility ensures that users can easily charge their hearing aids without the hassle of dealing with multiple chargers or cables.

The three key benefits of this compatibility are:

1. Convenience: Users can simply place their Starkey hearing aids in the Custom Charger Case and let it handle the charging process. This eliminates the need for separate chargers or power cables, making it easier and more convenient for users to maintain their hearing aids.

2. Versatility: The Custom Charger Case is compatible with a variety of Starkey hearing aids, including Evolv AI, Livio Edge AI, Livio AI, and Livio ITC/HS Rechargeable and ITE Rechargeable models. This means that users with different types of Starkey hearing aids can all benefit from the convenience of the Custom Charger Case.

3. Future-Proofing: By investing in the Custom Charger Case, users can ensure that their charging needs are met even as they upgrade or change their Starkey hearing aids. The compatibility of the Custom Charger Case with multiple models ensures that users can continue to use it even if they switch to a different Starkey hearing aid in the future.

## Description and Functionality of the Charger Case

The Custom Charger Case by Starkey combines portability and convenience, serving as a revolutionary solution for charging and carrying selected custom Starkey hearing devices.

This portable charging station functions as a carry case, providing at least three charges for lithium-ion rechargeable hearing aids. It utilizes LED light indicators and lithium technology for quick and easy charging.

The charger case includes a cleaning tool brush and wax loop for aid maintenance. Produced by Starkey, known for their innovative products and ideas, the Custom Charger Case is compatible with Starkey custom products such as Evolv AI, Livio Edge AI, Livio AI, and Livio ITC/HS Rechargeable and ITE Rechargeable hearing aids.

However, it is not compatible with Starkey RIC or BTE aids without custom molds, for which the Starkey Standard Charger or Mini Turbo Charger is recommended.

## The Charging Process for the Custom Charger Case

Continuing the discussion from the previous subtopic, let us delve into the charging process for the innovative Custom Charger Case by Starkey. This revolutionary charging case offers a seamless and efficient way to recharge your hearing aids. Here are three key aspects of the charging process that will surely impress you:

1. Fast and convenient charging: The on-board charger battery of the Custom Charger Case fully powers up in just 2.5 hours, ensuring minimal waiting time for your hearing aids to be fully charged.

2. Multiple charges in one go: The Custom Charger Case can hold up to three full charges for your hearing aids. This means you can charge your devices multiple times before needing to recharge the case itself.

3. Intuitive battery level indicators: The LED lights on the Custom Charger Case serve as a visual guide for the battery level. With four solid lights indicating a full charge and a blinking light indicating a low charge, you can easily keep track of the power status of your hearing aids.

With its speedy charging, multi-charge capability, and informative battery indicators, the Custom Charger Case by Starkey ensures an effortless and reliable charging experience for your hearing aids.

## Additional Features of the Charger Case

Let us now explore the additional features of Starkey's revolutionary Custom Charger Case, further enhancing the functionality and convenience for users of their innovative hearing aids.

The charger case comes in a stylish metallic black color, adding a touch of sophistication. Its smooth surface and magnetic lid make it easy to handle and use.

The case also includes mould bays, allowing users to securely store and protect their hearing aids. Additionally, a cleaning tool is included, consisting of a brush and wax loop for aid maintenance.

Another notable feature is the On-Board Charger, which enables charging on the go, providing added flexibility and convenience. Furthermore, the charger case is equipped with indicator lights that display the battery level of the hearing aids, ensuring users are aware of their remaining charge.

## Benefits of the Starkey Custom Charger Case

The Starkey Custom Charger Case offers users a multitude of advantages, enhancing the overall charging experience and convenience of their hearing aids. Here are three key benefits of the Starkey Custom Charger Case:

1. Efficient Charging: The Custom Charger Case utilizes LED light indicators and lithium technology, allowing for quick and easy charging of the hearing aids. This ensures that users can conveniently keep their devices powered up and ready to use.

2. Portability: Acting as both a charging station and a carry case, the Custom Charger Case provides users with a portable solution for charging their hearing aids. This means that users can conveniently charge their devices even when they are on the go.

3. Aid Maintenance: The Custom Charger Case includes a cleaning tool brush and wax loop, allowing users to easily maintain the cleanliness of their hearing aids. This ensures that the devices continue to deliver optimal performance and longevity.

## User Guide for the Custom Charger Case

The user guide for the Starkey Custom Charger Case provides detailed instructions on how to effectively use and maintain this innovative accessory for Starkey hearing aids.

To begin, the Custom Charger Case is compatible with selected custom Starkey hearing devices, including Evolv AI, Livio Edge AI, Livio AI, and Livio ITC/HS Rechargeable and ITE Rechargeable hearing aids. It utilizes LED light indicators and lithium technology for quick and easy charging.

The case functions as a portable charging station and carry case, providing at least 3 charges for lithium-ion rechargeable hearing aids before requiring recharging. The charging process is simple, with the on-board charger battery fully powering in 2.5 hours and hearing aids reaching full charge within 3.5 hours.

The case also includes additional features such as a stylish metallic black color, smooth surface with a magnetic lid, and mold bays and cleaning tools for maintenance.

## Maintenance Tips for the Charger Case

To ensure optimal performance and longevity of the Custom Charger Case, it is essential to follow these maintenance tips:

1. Regular Cleaning: Clean the charger case regularly using a soft, dry cloth to remove any dust or debris. Avoid using water or cleaning agents as they may damage the case.

2. Avoid Extreme Temperatures: Keep the charger case away from extreme temperatures, such as direct sunlight or freezing cold. Exposure to extreme temperatures can damage the internal components and reduce the overall lifespan of the case.

3. Handle with Care: When handling the charger case, be gentle and avoid dropping or mishandling it. Rough handling can lead to internal damage, affecting the charging performance and functionality of the case.

## How to Troubleshoot Common Issues With the Charger Case

Troubleshooting common issues with the Charger Case requires a systematic approach and attention to detail. If you encounter any problems with the charger case, there are a few steps you can take to resolve them.

Firstly, ensure that the case is properly connected to a power source and that the power supply cables are securely plugged in.

If the LED lights on the charger case are not illuminating, try using a different power outlet or cable to rule out any issues with the power source.

Additionally, make sure that the hearing aids are properly placed in the charger case and that the magnetic lid is securely closed.

If these troubleshooting steps do not resolve the issue, it is recommended to contact the manufacturer or authorized service center for further assistance.

## Where to Purchase the Starkey Custom Charger Case

You can find the Starkey Custom Charger Case for purchase at authorized retailers and online distributors.

Here are three reasons why you should consider purchasing this revolutionary charger case:

1. Convenience: The Starkey Custom Charger Case functions as a portable charging station and carry case, allowing you to easily charge your hearing aids on the go. With at least three charges for lithium-ion rechargeable hearing aids, you can enjoy uninterrupted use throughout the day.

2. Compatibility: This charger case is compatible with selected custom Starkey hearing devices, including Evolv AI, Livio Edge AI, Livio AI, and Livio ITC/HS Rechargeable and ITE Rechargeable hearing aids. It is designed specifically for these models, ensuring a perfect fit and optimal charging performance.

3. Quality and Innovation: Produced by Starkey, a renowned brand known for its innovative products and ideas, the Custom Charger Case is built with quality materials and features LED light indicators and lithium technology for quick and easy charging. It also includes a cleaning tool brush and wax loop for aid maintenance, making it a comprehensive and reliable accessory for your hearing aids.

## Frequently Asked Questions

### How Long Does It Take for the On-Board Charger Battery to Fully Power?

The on-board charger battery in the Starkey Custom Charger Case fully powers in 2.5 hours. This portable charging station and carry case is designed to provide at least 3 charges for lithium-ion rechargeable hearing aids.

### How Many Charges Can the Custom Charger Case Provide for Lithium-Ion Rechargeable Hearing Aids?

The custom charger case for lithium-ion rechargeable hearing aids can provide at least 3 charges. It functions as a portable charging station and carry case, featuring LED lights to indicate battery levels and a stylish metallic black design.

### What Are the Different LED Light Indicators and What Do They Signify?

The LED light indicators on the Starkey Custom Charger Case signify the battery level. Four solid lights indicate a fully charged battery, three solid lights show less than 75% charge, two solid lights indicate less than 50% charge, and one blinking light indicates low charge.

### Can the Custom Charger Case Be Used With Starkey RIC or BTE Aids Without Custom Molds?

No, the Starkey Custom Charger Case cannot be used with Starkey RIC or BTE aids without custom molds. For these types of aids, the Starkey Standard Charger or Mini Turbo Charger is recommended.

### What Is the Recommended Charger for Starkey RIC and BTE Aids?

The recommended charger for Starkey RIC and BTE aids without custom molds is the Starkey Standard Charger or Mini Turbo Charger. These chargers are compatible with the mentioned aids and provide efficient charging capabilities.

## Conclusion

In conclusion, the Starkey Custom Charger Case is a groundbreaking device that offers quick and convenient charging for selected custom Starkey hearing aids.

With its sleek design and additional features such as mold bays and a cleaning tool, it provides a stylish and effortless solution for aid maintenance.

While the charger case is not compatible with certain types of aids, it is set to revolutionize the way we charge and care for our hearing aids.

With its stylish and lightweight design, Bluetooth technology, and fast charging time, the Roger Pen provides superb sound quality, reduces background noise, and enhances entertainment by connecting to various audio devices. It also offers hassle-free operation with automatic microphone settings adjustment and a mute function for convenient control.

## Key Features of Roger Pen

With its stylish and lightweight design, the Roger Pen offers a range of key features that make it an essential accessory for individuals with hearing loss.

With these features, the Roger Pen provides superb sound quality, reduces background noise, and offers hassle-free operation for individuals with hearing loss.

## Features of Roger MyLink Receiver

The Roger MyLink Receiver offers a range of features that enhance the listening experience for individuals with hearing loss. Its lightweight and stylish design allows it to be comfortably worn around the neck, either over or under clothing.

The receiver is equipped with colour indicator lights for easy status identification, and volume control for personalized listening experience. It also has an autosave volume setting for convenience, ensuring that the user's preferred volume level is automatically saved.

With a quick charge time of 2 hours for 100% battery, the Roger MyLink Receiver offers up to 10 hours of operating time for extended use. Its range of up to 20 meters allows for flexible mobility, and it operates in the 2.4GHz ISM Band, which is unlicensed and globally available.

## Pairing the Roger Pen and MyLink

Pairing the Roger Pen and MyLink is a seamless process that allows individuals with hearing loss to experience enhanced sound quality and connectivity. Here are three key steps to pairing the Roger Pen and MyLink:

- Turn on the Roger Pen by pressing and holding the power button until the LED indicator light turns on.
- Next, turn on the MyLink by pressing and holding the power button until the LED indicator light starts flashing.
- Once both devices are turned on, hold the Roger Pen and MyLink close to each other and wait for the LED indicator lights to turn solid, indicating a successful pairing.

By following these simple steps, users can easily connect the Roger Pen and MyLink, allowing for the transmission of audio from the Roger Pen directly to their hearing aids.

## How to Use the Roger Pen and MyLink Bundle

Effective utilization of the Roger Pen and MyLink bundle requires understanding and implementation of proper operational techniques. Here are three key steps to using the bundle effectively:

- Positioning: Proper positioning of the Roger Pen and MyLink is essential for optimal performance. Place the Roger Pen close to the sound source or speaker to capture clear audio. Wear the MyLink receiver around your neck, over or under clothing, to receive the transmitted audio.

- Adjusting settings: Use the volume control on the MyLink receiver to personalize your listening experience. Experiment with different volume levels to find the most comfortable setting. Additionally, take advantage of the mute function on the Roger Pen for convenient control when needed.

## Customer Reviews and Testimonials

Customers have been raving about the exceptional performance and convenience of the Phonak Roger Pen and MyLink hearing aid bundle. Many users have praised the bundle for its ability to enhance their hearing experience in various situations, such as group conversations, one-to-one conversations, TV streaming, and lectures.

The MyLink receiver unit, with its lightweight and stylish design, has been commended for its comfortable fit and personalized listening experience.

## Frequently Asked Questions

### How Does the Roger Pen and Mylink Bundle Improve Sound Quality for Individuals With Hearing Loss?

The Roger Pen and MyLink bundle improves sound quality for individuals with hearing loss by enhancing speech understanding in group conversations, one-to-one interactions, TV streaming, and other audio devices. It reduces background noise and offers seamless connectivity to hearing aids featuring Telecoil technology.

The MyLink receiver is specifically designed to be compatible with hearing aids featuring Telecoil technology. It ensures seamless connectivity and easy transmission of audio from the Roger Pen to these hearing aids.

The Roger Pen is compatible with a wide range of audio devices, allowing users to enjoy enhanced sound quality and reduced background noise. Its versatile connectivity options make it suitable for various applications.

### What Is the Maximum Range at Which the Roger Pen Can Transmit Audio to the Mylink Receiver?

The Roger Pen can transmit audio to the MyLink receiver at a maximum range of up to 10 meters (30 feet). It ensures seamless connectivity and enhances sound quality for individuals with hearing loss.

There are no special maintenance or care instructions for the Phonak Roger Pen and MyLink bundle. However, it is recommended to clean them regularly using a soft cloth and to avoid exposing them to excessive moisture or heat.

In conclusion, the Phonak Roger Pen and MyLink bundle offers a powerful solution for individuals with hearing loss. With advanced technology and convenient features, this ultimate hearing aid bundle enhances communication and improves the overall hearing experience.

The compatibility with Telecoil technology and the extended range of the MyLink Receiver provide flexibility and mobility.

The Widex Sound Assist also functions as a remote control for Widex Moment Bluetooth hearing aids, enabling hands-free phone calls with exceptional sound clarity.

### Can the Widex Sound Assist Be Used With Other Bluetooth Devices Besides Hearing Aids?

Yes, the Widex Sound Assist can be used with other Bluetooth devices besides hearing aids. It allows for hands-free phone calls, streaming from any Bluetooth device, and even acts as a remote control for Widex Moment Bluetooth hearing aids.

### Can the Widex Sound Assist Be Used in Noisy Environments?

Yes, the Widex Sound Assist can be used in noisy environments. It enhances hearing in work meetings and group conversations with Table Microphone Mode, allowing for improved communication and understanding in challenging acoustic environments.

### How Long Does It Take to Pair the Widex Sound Assist With the Hearing Aids?

The pairing process between the Widex Sound Assist and hearing aids takes approximately 3 seconds. By pressing the volume up button and power button simultaneously for 3 seconds, the devices will initiate pairing automatically, indicated by a flashing green light.

## Conclusion

In conclusion, the Widex Sound Assist is a compact and lightweight device that offers an ultimate upgrade to hearing aids.

Its versatile features, such as Partner Microphone Mode and Table Microphone Mode, enhance hearing in various settings.

Additionally, its seamless streaming and remote control functionality provide convenience and exceptional sound quality.

Furthermore, with quick charging and a long battery life, the Widex Sound Assist is a portable and versatile solution for improved hearing in everyday life.

# Widex UNI-DEX Neckloop Streamer: The Ultimate Hearing Aid Accessory

Introducing the Widex UNI-DEX Neckloop Streamer, the ultimate accessory for hearing aid users seeking seamless connectivity and enhanced functionality.

This innovative device allows audio streaming from any device with a 3.5mm audio jack output directly to compatible Widex hearing aids.

With a remarkable battery life of up to 40 hours and a quick recharge time of just one hour, the UNI-DEX Neckloop Streamer ensures uninterrupted usage throughout the day.

Its built-in microphone enables hassle-free hands-free calling, while the headset function further enhances communication capabilities.

This neckloop streamer offers an incredibly stable connection that never disconnects, providing a reliable and enjoyable listening experience.

## Features of the Widex UNI-DEX Neckloop Streamer

The features of the Widex UNI-DEX Neckloop Streamer include the ability to stream audio to hearing aids from any device with a 3.5mm audio jack output and a long battery life of up to 40 hours. This streamer also has a quick recharge time of only one hour, ensuring minimal downtime.

Additionally, it has a built-in microphone for hands-free use with mobile phones or Skype, making it a versatile accessory. The UNI-DEX Neckloop Streamer functions as a headset for hands-free calling, allowing users to communicate conveniently. It offers an incredibly stable connection that does not disconnect, ensuring a seamless listening experience.

The device is easy to use, with no pairing required, and works straight out of the box with compatible Widex hearing aids. Its unique Room Off feature temporarily turns off the hearing aid microphone, providing users with more control over their listening environment.

## Benefits of Using the Widex UNI-DEX Neckloop Streamer

One significant advantage of utilizing the Widex UNI-DEX Neckloop Streamer is its ability to provide a stable and hassle-free connection for streaming audio to compatible hearing aids. This means that users can enjoy a seamless and uninterrupted listening experience without the frustration of constant disconnections.

The neckloop streamer is incredibly easy to use, simply requiring users to plug it in and start streaming. It also features a unique Room Off function that temporarily turns off the hearing aid microphone, allowing users to focus on the audio they are streaming.

Additionally, the UNI-DEX Neckloop Streamer does not require any pairing and works straight out of the box with compatible Widex hearing aids. With this accessory, users can enjoy hands-free communication while driving or in any other situation where it is necessary.

## The Unique Room off Feature of the Widex UNI-DEX Neckloop Streamer

Utilizing its unique Room Off feature, the Widex UNI-DEX Neckloop Streamer allows users to temporarily disable the microphone on their hearing aids, providing an uninterrupted and focused audio streaming experience.

This feature is particularly useful in situations where background noise or conversations may interfere with the streamed audio. By turning off the microphone, users can eliminate distractions and fully immerse themselves in the audio they are listening to.

Whether it's enjoying music, watching a movie, or participating in a conference call, the Room Off feature ensures that the user's hearing aids are solely focused on receiving the streamed audio, resulting in enhanced clarity and enjoyment.

With this innovative feature, the Widex UNI-DEX Neckloop Streamer truly elevates the audio streaming experience for individuals with hearing aids.

One essential step to using the Widex UNI-DEX Neckloop Streamer is to carefully follow the provided instructions. Follow these steps to ensure proper usage of the device:

1. Connecting the Neckloop Streamer:
